languages.text: "А еще было бы неплохо обобрать этих покойничков. Алые выродки все к себе в берлогу тащили — и хорошее, и плохое. А теперь, когда вы их перебили, зачем добру пропадать-то?"

traits.locale_text: "А еще было бы неплохо обобрать этих покойничков. Алые выродки все к себе в берлогу тащили — и хорошее, и плохое. А теперь, когда вы их перебили, зачем добру пропадать-то?"
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: "It would be a good idea to loot these cadavers, too. The crimson degenerates hoard stuff, precious and useless alike. Now that you've killed them, it would be a shame to let all those things go to waste."
languages.original_text: "А еще было бы неплохо обобрать этих покойничков. Алые выродки все к себе в берлогу тащили — и хорошее, и плохое. А теперь, когда вы их перебили, зачем добру пропадать-то?"

traits.locale_text: "It would also be nice to loot the cadavers. The Crimson degenerates hoard stuff, both precious and useless. Now that you have killed them, it would be a shame to let their possessions go to waste."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "It would also be nice to loot the cadavers. The Crimson degenerates hoard stuff, both precious and useless. Now that you have killed them, it would be a shame to let their possessions go to waste."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "It would also be nice to loot the cadavers. The Crimson degenerates hoard stuff, both precious and useless. Now that you have killed them, it would be a shame to let their possessions go to waste."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "It would also be nice to loot the cadavers. The Crimson degenerates hoard stuff, both precious and useless. Now that you have killed them, it would be a shame to let their possessions go to waste."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "It would be a good idea to loot these cadavers, too. The crimson degenerates hoard stuff, precious and useless alike. Now that you've killed them, it would be a shame to let all those things go to waste."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "It would be a good idea to loot these cadavers, too. The crimson degenerates hoard stuff, precious and useless alike. Now that you've killed them, it would be a shame to let all those things go to waste."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: “搜刮这些尸体也是个好主意。这些堕落的家伙囤积了很多东西，既有珍贵的东西，也有没用的废品。既然你已经杀掉了他们，那就别让那些东西白白浪费，否则就太可惜了。”
languages.original_text: "It would be a good idea to loot these cadavers, too. The crimson degenerates hoard stuff, precious and useless alike. Now that you've killed them, it would be a shame to let all those things go to waste."

traits.locale_text: “搜刮这些尸体也是个好主意。这些堕落的家伙囤积了很多东西，既有珍贵的东西，也有没用的废品。既然你已经杀掉了他们，那就别让那些东西白白浪费，否则就太可惜了。”
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: «Sería buena idea saquear esos cadáveres también. Los degenerados carmesíes lo acumulan todo, valioso o no. Ahora que los ha matado, sería una lástima desperdiciar lo que tenían».
languages.original_text: "It would be a good idea to loot these cadavers, too. The crimson degenerates hoard stuff, precious and useless alike. Now that you've killed them, it would be a shame to let all those things go to waste."

traits.locale_text: «Sería buena idea saquear esos cadáveres también. Los degenerados carmesíes lo acumulan todo, valioso o no. Ahora que los ha matado, sería una lástima desperdiciar lo que tenían».
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: 「こうした遺体から物資をいただくこともできます。血なまぐさい異常者が、貴重な物、がらくた問わず物資をため込んでいますので。陛下がヤツらを殺してくれた今、ああしたものを全部無駄にするわけにはいきません」
languages.original_text: "It would be a good idea to loot these cadavers, too. The crimson degenerates hoard stuff, precious and useless alike. Now that you've killed them, it would be a shame to let all those things go to waste."

traits.locale_text: 「こうした遺体から物資をいただくこともできます。血なまぐさい異常者が、貴重な物、がらくた問わず物資をため込んでいますので。陛下がヤツらを殺してくれた今、ああしたものを全部無駄にするわけにはいきません」
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: « On devrait faire les poches à ces cadavres, aussi. Ces dégénérés écarlates amassent toujours tout un tas de choses, précieuses comme inutiles. Maintenant que vous les avez tués, ce serait dommage de gâcher tout ça. »
languages.original_text: "It would be a good idea to loot these cadavers, too. The crimson degenerates hoard stuff, precious and useless alike. Now that you've killed them, it would be a shame to let all those things go to waste."

traits.locale_text: « On devrait faire les poches à ces cadavres, aussi. Ces dégénérés écarlates amassent toujours tout un tas de choses, précieuses comme inutiles. Maintenant que vous les avez tués, ce serait dommage de gâcher tout ça. »
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: "Es wäre eine gute Idee, auch diese Leichen zu durchsuchen. Die purpurnen Wahnsinnigen horten alles, ob es wertvoll oder nutzlos ist. Ihr habt sie getötet, da wäre es doch schade, das alles liegen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "It would be a good idea to loot these cadavers, too. The crimson degenerates hoard stuff, precious and useless alike. Now that you've killed them, it would be a shame to let all those things go to waste."

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre eine gute Idee, auch diese Leichen zu durchsuchen. Die purpurnen Wahnsinnigen horten alles, ob es wertvoll oder nutzlos ist. Ihr habt sie getötet, da wäre es doch schade, das alles liegen zu lassen."
traits.speaker: Prisoner
